thread.title: Is Adolf Hitler ALIVE? Shock as cops hunt for lookalike spotted at Nazi's birthplace
thread.title_full: Is Adolf Hitler ALIVE? Shock as cops hunt for lookalike spotted at Nazi's birthplace

title: Is Adolf Hitler ALIVE? Shock as cops hunt for lookalike spotted at Nazi's birthplace
text:
GETTY LOOKALIKE: Adolf Hitler's doppleganger has been spotted near his Austrian birthplace 
Cops are investigating reports of the bizarre sightings in the Austrian town of Braunau am Inn where the race hate leader was born in 1889. 
As well as being a spitting image of the notorious dictator, the bloke even identified himself as "Harald Hitler", one local resident said. 
The man, who is thought to be between 25 and 30 years old, was last seen in a bookstore browsing through magazines about World War 2. Who's Who of Hitler's henchmen Tuesday, 23rd August 2016 Extraordinary album of Nazi war criminals’ mug shots unearthed more than 70 years after fall of Third Reich. 1 / 10 “I have often seen this gentlemen in Braunau and wonder if this means something” Local resident 
A local resident snapped a picture of the doppleganger and posted it on Facebook, saying the man resembled Hitler. 
The Oberoesterreichische Nachrichten paper reported him as saying: "I have often seen this gentlemen in Braunau and wonder if this means something." 
Prosecutors have confirmed the report as Austrian authorities continue to investigate. Related videos
